classTranscendencePerks.name: Expirienced Fighter
classTranscendencePerks.effect: Increases the dmg targets take by 20%.

classTranscendencePerks.name: Excellent Strategy
classTranscendencePerks.effect: Increases CC ACC of all allies by 150. If the ally uses the same Perk, only 50 additional CC ACC applies.

classTranscendencePerks.name: Battle Cry
classTranscendencePerks.effect: Increases HP of all allies by 15%. If the ally uses the same Perk, only 5% additional HP applies.

classTranscendencePerks.name: Shield of Protection
classTranscendencePerks.effect: Block Rate is increased by 200 and CC resistance is increased by 200.

classTranscendencePerks.name: Swift Move
classTranscendencePerks.effect: Increases ATK Spd by 200 and ACC by 400.

classTranscendencePerks.name: Opportune Strike
classTranscendencePerks.effect: Crit Chance is increased by 150 and Crit DMG is increased by 30%.

classTranscendencePerks.name: Warlike
classTranscendencePerks.effect: Per each enemy, ATK is increased 7% and CC Resistance is increased by 30. Can be stacked up to max 10 times.

classTranscendencePerks.name: Offensive Guard
classTranscendencePerks.effect: ATK rises equal to half of P.DEF and received P.DMG is decreased by 15%.

classTranscendencePerks.name: Tactical Foresight
classTranscendencePerks.effect: Dodge rate is increased by 200 and takes 10% reduced DMG.

classTranscendencePerks.name: Blood Wrath
classTranscendencePerks.effect: Increases Lifesteal by 200 and ATK Spd by 200.
